    Description
    PieceInterface
    Interface to be used along the piece factory
    PloyBoard
    Concrete class representing the logic aspects of the game board
    PloyBoardSquare
    Concrete class for representing a board square, contains all the information about the piece placed on it.

    Concrete class of a file manager for Ploy
    PloyGUI
    Concrete class representing a GUI for Ploy
    PloyModerator
    Concrete class for a moderator for Ploy in charge of reviewing the game's state to determine if a player is out, legal moves and game over conditions.
